amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement or enforce provisions with respect to BPAR, BR and ER incandescent reflector lamps.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce section 430.32(x), with respect to light bulbs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Burgess.
